prs.title: bump cosmos-sdk; remove cometbft
prs.truncated_body: With the chainlink-cosmos dep removed, we are unblocked from bumping `cosmos-sdk` which is only used by the keystore. `cometbft` was only used for random integers and a strings package, both of which can be swapped over to the standard library.

commits.message: bump cosmos-sdk; remove cometbft; bump geth; remove replace

prs.title: Fix broken build in fd_rocksdb.h
prs.truncated_body:
fd_block_t is only declared if FD_HAS_ROCKSDB is set.
This results in the Frankendancer fdctl build failing if lz4,
zstd, and secp256k1 extras are available, but RocksDB is not.

commits.message:
Fix broken build in fd_rocksdb.h

fd_block_t is only declared if FD_HAS_ROCKSDB is set.
This results in the Frankendancer fdctl build failing if lz4,
zstd, and secp256k1 extras are available, but RocksDB is not.

prs.title: Cleanups and fixes to maintenance
prs.truncated_body:
Only the last commit has functional changes, which are fixes to maintenance introduced by #4543. Changes are as follows, by commit:
- Resolves https://github.com/stellar/stellar-core/issues/4586
- Remove an old history mode which became obsolete after `in-memory` got removed
- Cleanup various interfaces, there were several unused variables
- Two main changes are: (1) restore maintenance of SCP

commits.message: Remove obsolete history mode from Config, and state rebuild functionality from LedgerManager
Remove unused arguments in various interfaces touched by the apply path
Fixes to maintenance: purge ledger headers in the background, properly do SCP history maintenance, improve tests

prs.title: Remove apostrophe from Dockerfile comments
prs.truncated_body:
Remove apostrophe from inline comment within Dockerfile.

Prior to this change, Dockerfile does not display correctly within Visual Studio. Seems to be an odd edge case. Removing the apostrophe to improve locally. Feel free to ignore and close if preferred to leave as is.

commits.message: remove apostrophe from comment in Dockerfile

prs.title: [ci] Simplify tmpnet monitoring action
prs.truncated_body:
## Why this should be merged

Incorporates the following into the action to simplify usage:
- Configure network shutdown delay to ensure a final metrics scrape
- Save tmpnet dir as a github artifact
- Encapsulate nix installation into a new custom action 

## How this works

- Enables network shutdown delay with TMPNET_DELAY_NETWORK_SHUTDOWN  env var to enable configuration via the action

commits.message:
[ci] Simplify tmpnet monitoring action

Incorporate the following into the action to simplify usage:
- Configure network shutdown delay to ensure a final metrics scrape
- Save tmpnet dir as a github artifact
fixup: Reduce simplify the use of the monitoring action
fixup: Simplify nix installation with a custom action

prs.title: fix: fixed incorrect tx size and tx fee calculations
prs.truncated_body:
Fixes #277 

Details:
- TTL was relative and resulted in transaction with lower transaction size
- Fee calculation logic was incorrect, the only fee calculation logic in the specs is: minFeeA * transaction_size + minFeeB
- Small stylistic fixes
- Removal of updateTxSize method within /construction/payload endpoint
- Small code style refactorings

commits.message: fix: fix issue with incorrect transaction size and ttl
